casebody.data:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Appellant, v. BOISE IMPLEMENT COMPANY, Appellee. No. 14154. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. Sept. 22, 1954. George J. Bott, Gen. Counsel, David P. Findling, Associate Gen. Counsel, A. Norman Somers, Asst. Gen. Counsel, Samuel M. Singer, John F. Lawless, Attys., N.L.R.B. Washington, D. C., for petitioner. Eli A. Weston, Boise, Idaho, for respondent.

Before HEALY, POPE and FEE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The petition of the Board for enforcement of its order is granted for the reasons given in the Board’s decision and order, 106 N.L.R.B. No. 114.
